changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE USER ( ID NUMBER(19,0) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, USERNAME VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, PASSWORD VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, FIRSTNAME VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, LASTNAME VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, EMAIL VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, INTERESTS VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, CREATE_DATE DATE DEFAULT SYSDATE, UPDATE_DATE DATE DEFAULT SYSDATE, PRIMARY KEY(id) );
